about.summary: Provides inference based on the survey package for the wide range of parametric models in the 'VGAM' package.
Provides inference based on the survey package for the wide range of parametric models in the 'VGAM' package.

name: r-svyvgam
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "1.2-17" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-svyvgam
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/svyVGAM_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/svyVGAM/svyVGAM_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 28382a534fde6e3d927cd71315960ceaa9578a9ea67bf18a7b28d422cadff0a6

build:
  number: 1
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
    - cross-r-base {{ r_base }}    # [build_platform != target_platform]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-vgam
    - r-survey
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-vgam
    - r-survey

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('svyVGAM')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('svyVGAM')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=svyVGAM
  license: GPL-3.0-only
  summary: Provides inference based on the survey package for the wide range of parametric models in the 'VGAM' package.
  license_family: GPL3
  license_file:
    - '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-3'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - vitodelgrec

# Package: svyVGAM
# Title: Design-Based Inference in Vector Generalised Linear Models
# Version: 1.2
# Author: Thomas Lumley
# Description: Provides inference based on the survey package for the wide range of parametric models in the 'VGAM' package.
# Imports: stats, methods
# Depends: VGAM, survey, R (>= 3.5.0)
# Suggests: pscl, knitr, markdown, rmarkdown
# VignetteBuilder: knitr
# Encoding: UTF-8
# License: GPL-3
# Maintainer: Thomas Lumley <t.lumley@auckland.ac.nz>
# NeedsCompilation: no
# Packaged: 2023-03-30 00:29:24 UTC; tlum005
# Repository: CRAN
# Date/Publication: 2023-03-30 22:00:02 UTC
